A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A series of massive plot holes and incoherence strung together with meaningless action\, character humiliation and failure. 

An anti-Star Wars movie written by someone who apparently doesn't care\, or actively dislikes\, the narrative essence of the story. 

And let me tell you - I really wanted to like this movie - I like liking things - but this was so bad it was painful to watch.
